column5: Hello everyone,  Does anyone have some suggestions for general areas in the Cook's bay/Gilford area of Simcoe for some Pike/Bass?   All expertise is greatly appreciated!!

Crates Marine. Work the whole area. If you have a trolling motor work your way around the boats.They are pretty friendly there as long as you dont bang the lures off thier boats.They like the entertainment of a fish being caught.
Thanks Misfish!  I appreciate it.  Does anyone else have any suggestions?

Anywhere in the weed off Gilford.  Two weeks ago I hooked a beauty about 100m from shore in 8ft of water.  Only problem was my line snapped and I lost it.  If you catch or see one with a 'hot steel' coloured xrap in its mouth that's the one! I want that lure back LOL  Good luck 007
For bass I've done well near the mouth of the Holland River but for pike you need to go deeper.  I tend to troll in anywhere from 8-12 fow water.
